title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin admits he was wrong about the Bears in the offseason and why they are headed in the right direction under new head coach Matt Eberflus. He points out Patriots head coach Bill Belichick is out of touch with the current NFL after losing Tom Brady and long time offensive coordinator Josh McDaniels. He gives you his Herd Hierarchy after week 7 of the NFL. Plus, former NFL GM Thomas Dimitroff joins the show to talk about the slumping Packers and what they can do at the trade deadline to turn around their season. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
